review_title: Continually asked to do more with less.
pros: Some genuinely nice professors, trying to make a difference in their student's lives.  Lovely campus, about 45 minutes away from downtown Milwaukee.  Decent facilities.
cons: Huge disconnect between administration and faculty - so bad that the faculty tried to unionize.  Very low faculty morale.  In my former position it was clear to me that the admin considered me low-hanging fruit and never really saw the growth made by our department and how we enhanced the educational experience for all students. Lots of my colleagues share my sentiments.
